I really enjoyed this game during my younger years in 2000 when it was just Counter-strike and CS- Source in 04' but now valve should be ashamed of themselves for letting this game go out of control with all these hackers. I get it that its profit in their pockets and but honestly if they cant fix the issue with all these no life little kids or losers who think its cool to cheat they should consider shutting down the game completely. 

PS - Alot of "overwatch" are hackers as well regret ever paying for prime thinking it would be less hackers.

Loads of fun in official competitive matchmaking.

The only downside is all the hackers and cheaters, which will probably never be fixed, just play for free, dont waste your money on prime it will solve nothing.
